original_text:
Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin
La nuova slot machine Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin di Stakelogic si rivolge a coloro che amano il gameplay che mixa elementi tradizionali con funzionalità sperimentali. Se non viene attivato alcun bonus, la modalità base è comunque interessante ma non appena i jolly, gli scatter o altri simboli o caratteristiche speciali atterrano sui rulli, raggiunge un livello completamente nuovo. Continua  a leggere questa scheda informativa e prova un giro in demo o con soldi veri! 
Come giocare alla slot Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin
Questa video slot online si svolge su un set di rulli 6×6 e utilizza un motore a pagamento scatter. Vinci ogni volta che un certo numero di simboli appare contemporaneamente in qualsiasi punto della griglia. Se non conosci questa meccanica di pagamento, puoi familiarizzare con la demo slot Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin. Non c’è bisogno di cercare chissà dove, poiché è presente sul nostro sito Web gratuitamente.
Premi i pulsanti Più e Meno per regolare i valori delle scommesse in gettoni da 0,20€ e 20€. Puoi anche fare clic sull’icona della fiche e scegliere manualmente la tua puntata totale preferita. Premi il pulsante Gira per giocare una slot Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold & Spin. In alternativa, puoi utilizzare la funzione Autoplay per impostare e personalizzare diversi giri automatici.
Anche se l’RTP è del 95,74% e quindi un po’ inferiore alla media, questo gioco può offrire fino a 20.000 vincite di puntate e fino a quattro jackpot.
Simbologia e Pagamenti di Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin
A differenza della maggior parte delle slot online, non troverai i tipici valori nominali delle carte nello slot Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold & Spin. Puoi consultare la tabella dei pagamenti per confermare tutte le combinazioni di pagamento insieme ai loro potenziali premi. Quando colpisci otto o più simboli identici in qualsiasi punto della griglia contemporaneamente, attiverai una vincita. I premi della tabella dei pagamenti riflettono l’attuale configurazione della scommessa.

Il limone, l’arancia, la prugna e l’uva sono i simboli a vincita bassa che assegnano rispettivamente fino a 2x, 4x, 5x e 8x la puntata;
Il melone, la fragola, il 7 fortunato rosso, la stella e la corona sono simboli più redditizi e rilasciano fino a 10, 12, 15, 25 e 50 volte la puntata.

Oltre ai simboli di pagamento standard, questa video slot ha anche icone Scatter, Premio e Moltiplicatore. Quelli speciali aiutano ad attivare diverse funzioni bonus. Dai un’occhiata al prossimo paragrafo per maggiori dettagli.
Caratteristiche bonus Fruity Wild Bonanza
Sebbene ci siano molti bonus da attivare in questo gioco, la maggior parte dell’azione avviene nella modalità Hold & Spin.

Gioco Hold & Spin

Quando sui rulli compaiono più di 3 scatter, si attiva questa funzione extra. Il gioco inizia con tre re-spin che si azzerano ogni volta che viene visualizzata una nuova icona. I simboli che possono colpire nella funzione includono:

I simboli premio che rivelano un moltiplicatore della puntata.
Le icone moltiplicatore che moltiplicano ogni simbolo attivo tranne il Collector per x2, x3, x5 o x10;
Le icone da collezione che aggiungono i valori di tutti gli altri simboli ad eccezione delle ricompense Mini (30x), Minor (100x) e Major (500x).

Quando tutte le 36 posizioni della griglia saranno piene, riceverai il primo premio del valore di 1000 volte la scommessa, oltre a ogni altra vincita. La funzione termina dopo aver assegnato il jackpot Grand Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold & Spin o quando non rimangono più giri;

Premi

Ricevi 3-6 premi prima dell’inizio del gioco Hold & Spin. I premi verranno assegnati in modo casuale sulla matrice 6×6 vuota e dipendono dal numero di scatter ottenuti nel gioco base per attivare il bonus Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold & Spin;

Super Puntata (Super Stake)

Attiva la Super Puntata per consentire ai simboli del moltiplicatore x2-x100 di atterrare nel gioco base. Inoltre, la funzione aumenta le tue possibilità di attivare l’Hold & Spin. Il Super Stake raddoppia la giocata;

Acquisto Bonus (Buy Bonus)

Apri questa funzione e scegli una delle cinque opzioni di acquisto che costano tra 100 e 250 volte l’importo della puntata. Successivamente, entri immediatamente nella modalità di gioco gratuita Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold & Spin.

Domande Frequenti 
Come posso giocare gratuitamente a Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold & Spin?

Giocare gratis alle slot non è mai un problema. Puoi semplicemente scegliere uno dei nostri casinò online più votati, cercare Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold & Spin e scegliere di giocare in modalità demo. Quando sei pronto per giocare sul serio, puoi semplicemente richiedere il tuo bonus di benvenuto e farti strada verso le grandi vincite.



Posso giocare alla slot Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold & Spin su dispositivi mobili?

Sì. tutte le slot online di Stakelogic, inclusa Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold & Spin, funzionano perfettamente su qualsiasi dispositivo e qualsiasi sito di casinò mobile.



Come si fa a vincere giocando a Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold & Spin?

Questo è un titolo con licenza che genera risultati casuali e tutto ciò di cui hai bisogno è una buona fortuna. Controlla la tabella dei pagamenti per vedere come e quanto puoi vincere e sfrutta al meglio le funzionalità extra che ti abbiamo descritto in questa recensione..

raw_translation.response:
Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin: A Review for Experienced Gamblers

Stakelogic's new slot machine, Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin, is for players who love the mix of traditional gameplay and experimental features. Though the base mode is interesting on its own, the game really comes alive with the appearance of wilds, scatters, or other special symbols and features on the reels. Read on for more information and try a demo spin or play for real money!

How to Play Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin

This online video slot takes place on a 6x6 reel set and uses a scatter pay engine. You win whenever a certain number of symbols appear at the same time, anywhere on the grid. If you're not familiar with this pay mechanic, you can try the Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin demo slot for free on our website.

Press the Plus and Minus buttons to adjust your bet values in coin denominations ranging from €0.20 to €20. Alternatively, click on the chip icon and manually select your preferred total bet. Hit the Spin button to play a spin of Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin or use the Autoplay feature to set and customize several automatic spins.

Though the RTP is 95.74%, slightly below average, this game can provide up to 20,000 times your bet in winnings and has up to four jackpots.

Symbols and Payouts in Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin

Unlike most online slots, you won't find the typical card nominal values in Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin. You can consult the paytable to confirm all the payout combos along with their potential prizes. You trigger a win when you hit eight or more matching symbols anywhere on the grid simultaneously. Paytable prizes reflect the current bet configuration.

The lemon, orange, plum, and grape are low paying symbols that award 2x, 4x, 5x, and 8x your bet, respectively;
The melon, strawberry, red lucky 7, star, and crown symbols are more lucrative, awarding up to 10x, 12x, 15x, 25x, and 50x your bet.

In addition to the standard pay symbols, this video slot also has Scatter, Prize, and Multiplier Icons. These special symbols help trigger various bonus features. Check out the next section for more details.

Bonus Features in Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin

While there are many bonuses to trigger in this game, most of the action happens in the Hold and Spin mode.

Hold and Spin Game

If you get more than three scatters on the reels, this extra feature is activated. The game starts with three re-spins that reset every time a new icon appears. Symbols that can hit during the feature include:

Prize symbols, which reveal a bet multiplier.
Multiplier icons, which multiply every active symbol except the Collector by x2, x3, x5, or x10;
Collection icons, which add up the values of all other symbols except the Mini (30x), Minor (100x), and Major (500x) rewards.

When all 36 grid positions are full, you'll receive the first prize of 1000x your bet value, plus any other winnings. The feature ends after awarding the Grand Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin jackpot or when no more spins are left;

Prizes

Get 3-6 prizes before the Hold and Spin game starts. Rewards will be randomly assigned on the empty 6x6 matrix and depend on the number of scatters obtained in the base game to trigger the Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin bonus;

Super Bet (Super Stake)

Activate the Super Bet to allow x2-x100 multiplier symbols to land in the base game. Additionally, the feature increases your chances of triggering the Hold and Spin. The Super Stake doubles your bet;

Buy Bonus

Open this feature and choose one of five purchasing options that cost between 100 and 250 times the bet amount. Subsequently, you enter the free Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin game mode immediately.

Frequently Asked Questions

How can I play Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin for free?

Playing free slots is never a problem. You can simply choose one of our top-rated online casinos, search for Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin, and choose to play in demo mode. When you're ready to play for real, just claim your welcome bonus and make your way to big wins.

Can I play Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin on mobile devices?

Yes. All Stakelogic online slots, including Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin, work perfectly on any device and any mobile casino site.

How can I win playing Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin?

This is a licensed title that generates random results, and all you need is good luck. Check the paytable to see how and how much you can win, and make the most of the extra features we described in this review.

Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin is an online slot game by Stakelogic that offers a blend of traditional and experimental features. With various bonuses and up to four jackpots, this game can provide a fun and rewarding experience.

Reel Set and Symbols

Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin is played on a 6x6 reel set with a scatter payout engine. Payouts are awarded when a certain number of symbols appear simultaneously on the grid. The game features standard payment symbols such as lemon, orange, plum, grape, melon, strawberry, lucky red 7, star, and crown. Additionally, there are special symbols like Scatter, Prize, and Multiplier icons, which activate different bonus features.

Jackpots and Payouts

Players can earn up to 20,000 bet wins and up to four jackpots by playing Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin. The game features a maximum RTP of 95.74%. Payouts are based on the current bet configuration and symbol combinations. For example, players can win up to 50 times their bet with the crown symbol or up to 8 times their bet with the grape symbol.

Bonus Features

Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin offers several bonus features. The Hold & Spin mode is activated when three or more scatters land on the reels. The game starts with three re-spins and features symbols like Prize, Multiplier, and Collector icons. In the Prizes feature, players receive 3-6 randomly assigned rewards before the start of Hold & Spin. Additionally, players can activate Super Bet to increase their chances of activating Hold & Spin and double their bet. Finally, the Buy Bonus feature allows players to choose one of five options to immediately enter the free Hold & Spin game mode.

Compatibility and Function

Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin works on any device and any mobile casino site. The game is easy to use, with players adjusting bet values and initiating gameplay using simple buttons and controls.

Traditional vs. Experimental Features

Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin blends traditional features, such as standard payment symbols and reel sets, with experimental features like the Hold & Spin mode and Super Bet option. This combination creates a unique and exciting gameplay experience for players.

Pros and Cons

Pros: Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin offers a variety of bonus features, up to four jackpots, and a blend of traditional and experimental gameplay. The game is easy to play and works on any device.
Cons: The maximum RTP is slightly lower than average, and players may need to take the time to learn the scatter payout engine. Additionally, some players may prefer more familiar symbols and features.

How to play Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin
This online video slot takes place on a 6x6 reel set and uses a scatter payout engine. Win every time a certain number of symbols appear simultaneously anywhere on the grid. If you're not familiar with this payout mechanic, you can get comfortable with the demo slot Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin. Press the Plus and Minus buttons to adjust bet values in coins from €0.20 to €20. You can also click on the chip icon and manually choose your preferred total bet. Press the Spin button to play a Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin slot. Alternatively, you can use the Autoplay feature to set and customize several automatic spins.

Although the RTP is 95.74% and therefore a bit lower than average, this game can offer up to 20,000 bet wins and up to four jackpots.

Symbolism and Payments of Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin
Unlike most online slots, you won't find the typical card nominal values ​​in the Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold and Spin slot. You can refer to the payout table to confirm all payment combinations along with their potential prizes. When you hit eight or more identical symbols simultaneously anywhere on the grid, you trigger a win. The payout table prizes reflect the current bet configuration.

The lemon, orange, plum, and grape are low-paying symbols that award up to 2x, 4x, 5x, and 8x the bet, respectively.
The melon, strawberry, lucky red 7, star, and crown are more profitable symbols, releasing up to 10, 12, 15, 25, and 50 times the bet.

In addition to the standard payment symbols, this video slot also has Scatter, Prize, and Multiplier icons. These special ones help activate different bonus features. Check out the next paragraph for more details.

Fruity Wild Bonanza Bonus Features
Although there are many bonuses to activate in this game, most of the action takes place in the Hold & Spin mode.

Hold & Spin Game

When more than 3 scatters land on the reels, this extra feature is activated. The game starts with three re-spins that reset every time a new icon is displayed. The symbols that can land in the feature include:

The prize symbols that reveal a bet multiplier.
The multiplier icons that multiply every active symbol except the Collector by x2, x3, x5, or x10;
The collector icons that add up the values ​​of all other symbols except Mini (30x), Minor (100x), and Major (500x) rewards.

When all 36 grid positions are full, you receive the first prize of 1000 times the bet value, in addition to any other winnings. The feature ends after awarding the Grand Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold & Spin jackpot or when there are no more spins.

Prizes

Receive 3-6 prizes before the start of Hold & Spin. The rewards will be randomly assigned to the empty 6x6 matrix and depend on the number of scatters obtained in the base game to trigger the Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold & Spin bonus.

Super Bet (Super Stake)

Activate the Super Bet to allow x2-x100 multiplier symbols to land in the base game. In addition, the feature increases your chances of activating Hold & Spin. The Super Stake doubles the bet.

Buy Bonus

Open this feature and choose one of the five purchase options that cost between 100 and 250 times the bet amount. Then, you immediately enter the free Fruity Wild Bonanza Hold & Spin game mode.
